arts.ttl: Serhou Guirassy and Waldemar Anton set for first VfB Stuttgart return with Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: The clash between two potential 2024/25 Bundesliga title contenders has added spice with new BVB stars Waldemar Anton and Serhou Guirassy set for differing receptions as they return to their former stomping ground. There will be plenty of tension in the air this weekend as last season’s runners-up VfB Stuttgart host 2023/24 UEFA Champions League finalists Borussia Dortmund.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: BVB’s Champions League Campaign Off to Winning Start Against Club Brugge
arts.sum: But a late rally from Dortmund’s substitutes got them over the line, with two goals from Jamie Gittens followed by Serhou Guirassy’s first Dortmund goal, from the penalty spot, in the game’s dying moments. Club Brugge had plenty of good moments tonight and can feel a little hard done by to come away from the game with nothing.

arts.ttl: Bynoe-Gittens double sends Dortmund past Brugge
arts.sum: Substitute Jamie Bynoe-Gittens scored two goals and Serhou Guirassy added a late penalty as Borussia Dortmund punished hosts Club Brugge for several wasted chances with a 3-0 win in their Champions League clash.

arts.ttl: Defensive vulnerabilities, Jamie Gittens, and more: Three things we learned from Borussia Dortmund’s victory over Club Brugge
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund kicked off their Champions League campaign with a 3-0 victory away to Belgian champions Club Brugge, continuing Nuri Şahin’s unbeaten start to life in charge of the club.…

arts.ttl: Dortmund bailed out by Bynoe-Gittens brilliance in Brugge
arts.sum: After last season's run to the final in Wembley, Borussia Dortmund return to UEFA Champions League action with a short trip to Belgian side Club Brugge for Matchday 1.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Club Brugge vs. Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: The lineups for Wednesday's Champions League clash between Club Brugge and Borussia Dortmund have been announced.

arts.ttl: Match Thread: Dortmund Visit Club Brugge in Opening Champions League Match
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. Absolutely no illegal streams.

arts.ttl: Why is Gio Reyna not playing for Borussia Dortmund against Club Brugge in the Champions League?
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund and USMNT winger Giovanni Reyna is set for a period on the sidelines after suffering an injury on international duty, his club manager confirmed last week. The 21-year-old returned home early from the recent international break having suffered the injury in a training session, ultimately missing out on a 2-1 loss to Canada and a 1-1 draw with New Zealand in a pair of friendlies held stateside.

arts.ttl: Former Borussia Dortmund head coach Edin Terzic a candidate for the vacant AS Roma job
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that former Borussia Dortmund head coach Edin Terzic is a candidate for the vacant AS Roma job after the Italians sacked Daniele De Rossi earlier today. No contact…

arts.ttl: Manchester United transfer news: Dortmund attacker attracting interest from three clubs?
arts.sum: Manchester United are reportedly one of three clubs who are interested in securing the signing of a Borussia Dortmund in the future.
